    "size": 200,

    "x": 470,

    "fontWeight": "bold",
    "color": "black",
    "align": "center"
  },

    "x": 470,
    "y": 658,
    "fontSize": 20,
    "fontFamily": "Arial",
    "fontWeight": "normal",
    "color": "black",
    "align": "center"
  }
